message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which we believe is an exceptional investment opportunity. Given its value to you, we are confident it will bring significant benefits to your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item for $1,150,000. We believe this price reflects its true worth while providing you with a favorable opportunity to acquire it. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your business or personal goals.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, I'm looking to secure this product for a slightly lower price point. Given its value to me, I'm willing to pay $1,050,000. This price reflects the potential benefits I see in the product while still remaining within my budget. I'm confident that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. In light of this, we would like to propose a revised offer of $1,075,000 for the product. We believe this price reflects both the value of the product to you and maintains a fair margin for us. We are committed to finding a solution that works for both parties and hope this proposal will facilitate that outcome.
